WGDgc
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which WGDgc installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using WGDgc, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load WGDgc/1.3-foss-2023a-R-4.3.2
```
